mapper.insert: insert into board(userId, category, title, content, viewCount, imgs) values(#{userId}, 2, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{imgs});
mapper.select: select b.id as boardId, b.title as title, b.content as content, b.written_date as written_date, b.viewCount as viewCount, b.imgs as imgs, u.id as userId, u.nickname as nickname, u.src_photo as src_photo, u.email as email, p.budget as budget, p.limit_to as limit_to, p.current_to as current_to, p.duration as duration, p.location as location from board as b inner join packageboard as p on b.id = p.id inner join user as u on b.userId = u.id where b.id = #{boardId};
select id from joinpackage where userId = #{userId} and packageId = #{packageId};
update board set viewcount = #{viewCount} where id = #{id};

select b.id, b.userId, b.title, b.imgs as contentImg, b.written_date, u.src_photo as userImg, p.budget, p.duration, p.limit_to, p.current_to from `board` as b inner join `user` as u on b.userId = u.id inner join `packageboard` as p on b.id = p.id order by b.id desc limit #{pageNum} , 8;
